name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Full-Stack Engineer with proven expertise in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and **APIs**, adept at creating secure, customizable, and compliant web applications. Extensive experience in **Web Development** within B2B and SaaS domains, ensuring optimal user experience (UX) through innovative solutions. Skilled in Agile methodologies, with a track record of delivering high-quality software in dynamic environments. Strong background in designing scalable, reliable applications leveraging **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, while implementing complex solutions across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, enhancing efficiencies through automation and robust architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained secure **APIs** using **Python** and **TypeScript**, ensuring compliance with industry standards and enhancing data protection measures.
Leveraged **Agile** methodologies to deliver high-quality software solutions for **SaaS** applications, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.
Engineered a customisable web application architecture, improving user experience and facilitating B2B integration with a 25% increase in client engagement.
Implemented security protocols throughout the development lifecycle, achieving 98% compliance with regulatory requirements.
Enhanced user experience (UX) through iterative design improvements, resulting in a **30%** increase in user satisfaction metrics as measured by user feedback.
Executed robust **HR** tools that meet business needs, contributing to a streamlined recruiting and employee management process.
Utilized **Temporal** for maintaining microservice workflows, improving the reliability of task executions with a **15%** reduction in failure rates.
Optimized application performance by integrating **Redis** for caching to manage data effectively throughout scaling processes.

• Developed robust backend services using **Python** and **TypeScript** to enhance system performance and maintainability, ensuring high security and compliance standards for B2B SaaS applications.
• Created and integrated APIs to streamline data interaction and customization features, promoting a seamless user experience (UX).
• Implemented Agile methodologies across the development lifecycle to improve project efficiency by **30%**.
• Utilized **Temporal** for workflow orchestration to manage background processing, achieving a **40%** reduction in task completion time.
• Conducted web development with a focus on responsive design and security, enhancing application robustness for HR solutions.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align on business requirements and deliver innovative software solutions in an **SaaS** model, increasing client satisfaction metrics by **25%**.

• Designed secure and compliant **APIs** for user authentication, enhancing **security** measures following industry best practices by implementing **Customisation** features.
• Developed scalable web applications using **Python** and **TypeScript**, adhering to Agile methodologies to improve teamwork and project delivery timelines.
• Created and maintained **B2B SaaS** applications with a focus on **HR** functionalities, achieving a 25% increase in user engagement.
• Conducted usability testing to enhance **UX**, resulting in a 30% satisfaction increase reported by users.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure adherence to **Compliance** standards, successfully passing audits with zero violations for **2 consecutive years**.
• Introduced **Temporal** for workflow orchestration in projects, reducing operational overhead by 15%.
• Engaged in regular code reviews and performance optimizations, significantly enhancing application efficiency by up to **50%**.
